testcase.name: Items added to cart for checkout
testcase.system-out: Given User is in the Greencart Landing Page.................................passed When User searches with the item short name Tom in Landing Page.............passed And Extracts the actual product name from Landing Page......................passed And Added "3" items of the selected product into the cart...................passed Then User proceeds to checkout and validate the Tom items in Checkout Page..passed And Verify user has ability to enter promo code and place the order.........passed

testcase.name: Item search experience
testcase.system-out: Given User is in the Greencart Landing Page.................................passed When User searches with the item short name Tom in Landing Page.............passed And Extracts the actual product name from Landing Page......................passed And User moves to Offers Page...............................................passed Then User searches with the same item short name Tom in Offers Page.........passed And Check whether same items are being displayed in the Offers Page.........passed
